this_title: Beats Rhymes and Life: The Travels of A Tribe Called Quest
trans_title: 节奏、韵律与生活：一个部落的旅行
introduction: Directed by the renowned New York City-based actor Mike Rappaport, offered is a sneak peak at his upcoming documentary on one of hip-hop’s most beloved groups of all time, A Tribe Called Quest. The documentary was said to have taken several years to shoot and is almost towards completion. Mike Rappaport has been known to be a hip-hop fan since his early days.
chinese_title: 节奏、韵律与生活：一个部落的旅行
foreign_title: Beats Rhymes and Life: The Travels of A Tribe Called Quest
